headline: Trump-backed Arizona candidate threatens Australian journalist: ‘Your days are numbered’
author: Bob Brigham
sentences: Kari Lake, the Trump-endorsed candidate for Arizona governor, has made international news for her ongoing denial of the fact Donald Trump lost both her state and the country in the 2020 election.

Watch:
NOW WATCH: Jen Psaki shoots down Peter Doocy's useless plan for lowering gas prices
Jen Psaki shoots down Peter Doocy's useless plan for lowering gas prices
"You want to keep pushing propaganda, your days are numbered," said by the conspiracy theorist, whom CNN has described as a "serial promoter of election lies."
The preview features Miles Taylor, the former chief of staff at the Department of Homeland during the Trump administration.
"On '60 Minutes,' Donald Trump eyes off another go at the top job," the narrator says in a new tease of the program.
The video features Lake, a former local Fox broadcaster, threatening an interviewer while walking off set.
Lake is featured in a new "60 Minutes" Australia exposé on the former president and his supporters.
Taylor argued that the MAGA movement is "the biggest cult phenomenon in western history."
"Only this time, he and his followers, aren't taking no for an answer."
